Weeks 3 & 4 - "rain stops play" a bit - 3 x steels arrive - steel cross beam and over bi-folds in - scaffold lift for ground floor roof - all ground floor ceiling joists in - flat roof in and insulated - scaffold lift for upstairs - upstairs walls built to roof line https://t.co/NuwPxuxreM
